Faithlife is the leading provider of digital content and tools for the Christian church. Over 2.5 million customers worldwide partner with Faithlife for the best Bible study experience. From the world's leading digital research tool for Bible study, Logos Bible Software; to cloud based presentation software, Proclaim; to a digital education platform, Mobile Ed; Faithlife is changing the way the world interacts with digital content. We offer our 450+ employees the autonomy and freedom they need to do their best work, from unlimited paid vacation to flexible work hours to an outdoor center. We're hiring REMOTE and onsite employees, as well as INTERNS.

We're currently looking for: - software developers - DevOps engineers - marketers - sales leaders - instructional media specialists

You can check out our full list of openings here: https://www.logos.com/about/careers.

We're headquartered in beautiful Bellingham, WA; surrounded by water and mountains, and smack-dab between Vancouver, BC and Seattle. Learn more about Bellingham here: http://bellinghamwins.com/.

Email us at careers@faithlife.com if you'd like to know more, or are interested in working with us!
